commit.message:
re PR target/56347 (FAIL: gfortran.dg/integer_exponentiation_2.f90  -O2  execution test)

	PR target/56347
	* config/pa/pa.c (pa_conditional_register_usage): On HP-UX, mark
	registers %fr12 and %fr12R as call used.

From-SVN: r196123

+	registers %fr12 and %fr12R as call used.
